item.title: How to Disassemble TOSHIBA Satelite T652
item.description: Introduction My TOSHIBA Satelite T652 (Model No. PSPKAN-01700M) which was bought in 2011 have never turned on. Therefore, I decided to recycle it. Before doing so, I will try to dissabsemble TOSHIBA Satelite T652. Disassemble TOHISBA Satelite T652 Flip it to the back side Remove a battery. Open the lid and remove all the screws. Place it with the keyboard side facing up. Gently pry up the edge with a
